item.title: latex links
item.description: Various links to direct Latex examples and some inline examples Underline words and sentences Existing commands for font sizes Modify colour of font Bracket sizes and types in math mode \begin{figure}[H] \centering \includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{../images/report/filename} \vspace{0.1cm} \caption{} \label{} \end{figure}
